00052 // ===========================================================================
00053 // method definitions
00054 // ===========================================================================
00055 RORDLoader_TripDefs::RORDLoader_TripDefs(RONet& net,
00056         SUMOTime begin, SUMOTime end,
00057         bool emptyDestinationsAllowed, bool withTaz,
00058         const std::string& fileName)
00059     : ROTypedXMLRoutesLoader(net, begin, end, fileName),
00060       myEmptyDestinationsAllowed(emptyDestinationsAllowed),
00061       myWithTaz(withTaz),
00062       myDepartureTime(-1), myCurrentVehicleType(0),
00063       myParameter(0), myHaveWarnedAboutDeprecatedTripDef(false) {}
00064 
00065 
00066 RORDLoader_TripDefs::~RORDLoader_TripDefs() {}
00067 
00068 
00069 void
00070 RORDLoader_TripDefs::myStartElement(int element,
00071                                     const SUMOSAXAttributes& attrs) {
00072     if (element == SUMO_TAG_TRIP__DEPRECATED && !myHaveWarnedAboutDeprecatedTripDef) {
00073         myHaveWarnedAboutDeprecatedTripDef = true;
00074         WRITE_WARNING("'" + toString(SUMO_TAG_TRIP__DEPRECATED) + "' is deprecated; please use '" + toString(SUMO_TAG_TRIP) + "'.");
00075     }
00076     // check whether a trip definition shall be parsed
00077     if (element == SUMO_TAG_TRIP || element == SUMO_TAG_TRIP__DEPRECATED) {
00078         bool ok = true;
00079         // get the vehicle id, the edges, the speed and position and
00080         //  the departure time and other information
00081         std::string id = getVehicleID(attrs);
00082         myDepartureTime = attrs.getSUMOTimeReporting(SUMO_ATTR_DEPART, id.c_str(), ok);
00083         if (myWithTaz) {
00084             myBeginEdge = getEdge(attrs, "origin", SUMO_ATTR_FROM_TAZ, id, false);
00085             myEndEdge = getEdge(attrs, "destination", SUMO_ATTR_TO_TAZ, id, myEmptyDestinationsAllowed);
00086         } else {
00087             myBeginEdge = getEdge(attrs, "origin", SUMO_ATTR_FROM, id, false);
00088             myEndEdge = getEdge(attrs, "destination", SUMO_ATTR_TO, id, myEmptyDestinationsAllowed);
00089         }
00090         myParameter = SUMOVehicleParserHelper::parseVehicleAttributes(attrs, true);
00091         myParameter->id = id;
00092         // recheck attributes
00093         if (!ok) {
00094             return;
00095         }
00096         if (myDepartureTime < 0) {
00097             WRITE_ERROR("The departure time must be positive.");
00098             return;
00099         }
00100     }
00101     // check whether a vehicle type shall be parsed
00102     if (element == SUMO_TAG_VTYPE || element == SUMO_TAG_VTYPE__DEPRECATED) {
00103         myCurrentVehicleType = SUMOVehicleParserHelper::beginVTypeParsing(attrs);
00104     } else if (myCurrentVehicleType != 0) {
00105         SUMOVehicleParserHelper::parseVTypeEmbedded(*myCurrentVehicleType, element, attrs);
00106     }
00107 }
00108 
00109 
00110 std::string
00111 RORDLoader_TripDefs::getVehicleID(const SUMOSAXAttributes& attrs) {
00112     // try to get the id, do not report an error if not given or empty...
00113     bool ok = true;
00114     std::string id = attrs.getOptStringReporting(SUMO_ATTR_ID, 0, ok, "", false);
00115     // get a valid vehicle id
00116     if (id == "") {
00117         return myIdSupplier.getNext();
00118     } else {
00119         return id;
00120     }
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00124 ROEdge*
00125 RORDLoader_TripDefs::getEdge(const SUMOSAXAttributes& attrs,
00126                              const std::string& purpose,
00127                              SumoXMLAttr which, const std::string& vid,
00128                              bool emptyAllowed) {
00129     UNUSED_PARAMETER(purpose);
00130     bool ok = true;
00131     std::string id = attrs.getStringReporting(which, 0, ok, !emptyAllowed);
00132     if (which == SUMO_ATTR_FROM_TAZ) {
00133         id += "-source";
00134     }
00135     if (which == SUMO_ATTR_TO_TAZ) {
00136         id += "-sink";
00137     }
00138     ROEdge* e = myNet.getEdge(id);
00139     if (e == 0 && !emptyAllowed) {
00140         WRITE_ERROR("The edge '" + id + "' is not known.\n Vehicle id='" + vid + "'.");
00141     }
00142     return e;
00143 }
00144 
00145 
00146 void
00147 RORDLoader_TripDefs::myEndElement(int element) {
00148     if ((element == SUMO_TAG_TRIP || element == SUMO_TAG_TRIP__DEPRECATED) &&
00149             !MsgHandler::getErrorInstance()->wasInformed()) {
00150 
00151         if (myDepartureTime < myBegin || myDepartureTime >= myEnd) {
00152             delete myParameter;
00153             return;
00154         }
00155         RGBColor* col = myParameter->wasSet(VEHPARS_COLOR_SET) ? new RGBColor(myParameter->color) : 0;
00156         RORouteDef* route = new RORouteDef_OrigDest(myParameter->id, col, myBeginEdge, myEndEdge);
00157         SUMOVTypeParameter* type = myNet.getVehicleTypeSecure(myParameter->vtypeid);
00158         // check whether any errors occured
00159         if (MsgHandler::getErrorInstance()->wasInformed()) {
00160             return;
00161         }
00162         if (myNet.addRouteDef(route)) {
00163             myNextRouteRead = true;
00164             // build the vehicle
00165             ROVehicle* veh = new ROVehicle(*myParameter, route, type);
00166             myNet.addVehicle(myParameter->id, veh);
00167         } else {
00168             WRITE_ERROR("The vehicle '" + myParameter->id + "' occurs at least twice.");
00169             delete route;
00170         }
00171         delete myParameter;
00172         myParameter = 0;
00173     }
00174     if (element == SUMO_TAG_VTYPE || element == SUMO_TAG_VTYPE__DEPRECATED) {
00175         SUMOVehicleParserHelper::closeVTypeParsing(*myCurrentVehicleType);
00176         myNet.addVehicleType(myCurrentVehicleType);
00177         myCurrentVehicleType = 0;
00178     }
00179 }
00180 
00181 
00182 void
00183 RORDLoader_TripDefs::beginNextRoute() {
00184     myNextRouteRead = false;
00185 }
